group_1.textRight: So this is... Takarazaki City.
I think Felicia told me that
Iroha's parents live here.
*Sigh*... I hope everyone is okay...

group_1.textLeft: ...You are always worried about others, aren't you,@Kako?

group_1.textRight: I mean, I get how she feels.
The Union's lost two Magical Girls already...
And there's no shortage of injured people.
Then that battle between the Tokime Clan@and the Neo-Magius a while back...

group_1.textLeft: I heard that Himena Aika,@the leader of the Neo-Magius, was eliminated...
Their faction lost its driving force, and is now@merely a ragtag bunch...
I am Meiyui Chun of the Blue Seas Family.@We'll be in your care for a little while.

group_1.textRight: My name is Nanaka Tokiwa.
I apologize deeply for any inconvenience@we may have caused you.
Thank you kindly for allowing us to stay here.

group_1.textCenter: Thanks for looking after us!

group_1.textLeft: No need to be so formal.
Us and the Blue Seas Family have always been@like siblings.
It makes sense that we'd help each other in times@of trouble, yeah?

group_1.textRight: ...I am in your debt.

group_1.textLeft: Well, when dinner's ready, I'll call you kiddos down.
In the meantime, make yourselves at home.

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, I couldn't bear to just...leave everything@up to you.
Is there anything we can do to help?

group_1.textLeft: It wouldn't look good on us to go pushin' a li'l lady@from Blue Seas around like a servant.

group_1.textRight: ...Don't call me that.
But in that case, I'll ask as well.
As someone who carries the Blue Seas name,@I do not want to owe too much.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, if ya insist, I can't say no, eh?
...There's a local event for the youngins coming up.
We're gonna host a little festival,@and I was wonderin' if you could help with that?

group_1.textRight: Gladly!

group_1.textCenter: *Sigh*... After all that hard work,@now I've gotta clean the warehouse...
Seriously, who even makes someone work two days@in a row?!
I can't make any progress on my special training@like this. I'm, like, legit withering here...
I used to use this broom for magic,@but now I'm just sweeping with it...
You're not looking so hot yourself, are you,@Mr. Broom? Sorry, that's my bad～...
Well, I'll finish up here and head for home.

group_1.textLeft: So we've gotta pick up supplies from the storage@room behind the Community Center?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, he said you need to use a big griddle@for making grilled squid...
Apparently there's a really good braised beef stew@stall at the festival...
I wonder if they'll have any good ramen stalls, too...?

group_1.textLeft: Man, now I'm startin' to get hungry.
*Chuckle*
...This magicー@Could it be another Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: I feel it, too. Wonder if she's nearby...?
Well, there is at least one other Magical Girl@in Takarazaki.

group_1.textLeft: My magic..."the ability to detect my true enemies",@hasn't picked up much of a reaction.
...I don't think we have any need to worry.

group_1.textRight: ...Ah! Is that the warehouse?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, it would seem so.

group_1.textRight: Alright then, let's get a move on and get this done!
He said he's gonna treat us tonight!

group_1.textLeft: He may have said we were like siblings,@but we can't let ourselves be careless.
We have to do our job, and we have to do it well,@you know?

group_1.textRight: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I wonder what we're havin' for dinner?

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you even listening?

group_1.textCenter: *Cough, cough*…@[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:102801:eyeClose_0][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Ugh, it's like, mega smoky in here...
[se:7201_detect_magic][chara:102801:effect_ef_adv_01]*Gasp*?!
(This reaction...another Magical Girl?!)

group_1.textRight: Now, where's the griddle?

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it that thing over there...?

group_1.textCenter: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](...I know those girls!)
(Yeah, that's right, Hiko...)
(I've never met them before, but...)
(They match the descriptions I heard from Shigurin@and the others...)
(They're Magical Girls from Kamihama...!)
(...What am I gonna do if they see me here?)
(If they find out I'm still kicking, it'll be harder for me@to make a move after this...)
(It'll also make it tough for the others to carry out@the plan they've been hatching...)
(I've gotta hide...!)
(Crap...)
...Is someone there?
(This cutie's in a real big pinch now, huh?!)
